name: Regular Comedy: A Game About Death
name_original: Regular Comedy: A Game About Death
description:
Regular Comedy is an atmospheric first person action platformer where you explore the strange plain of Purgatory.

You're dead, and your soul has appeared at a train station. A strange spirit invites you on a quest to reach haven.

Explore the world, talk to spirits, and climb The Tower of Babel.

It's a little hard sometimes, but keep at it! The ending is worth it!

Made for the B&W Jam

Controls:

  • WASD to move, mouse to move the camera.
  • Left click swings your sword, right click shoots.
  • E to talk to spirits or use the grapple hook (once it's unlocked)
  • Control to slide
  • Space to jump
  • Respawn in the pause menu

Features:

  • Explorable open-ish world
  • Interactive-ish NPCs
  • Functional-ish platforming
  • Has an options menu!
  • Really fun slide mechanic
  • Crazy lore
  • Oh, and a grapple hook.

Credits:

Code and modeling: Thomas Harriett & Terry Kang

Music: Joseph Harriett
